name: magnet-pull
short_effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
